column1: Regular traffic reports will resume Tuesday December 22 at 4:00 p.m.

column3: I-75/I-71 at the Brent Spence Bridge:
column4: I-75/I-71N is closed to all traffic starting at the I-275 interchange in preparation for the reopening of the bridge.

column3: I-75/I-71 at the Brent Spence Bridge:
column4: Please see complete details, detours, and updates from the KY Transportation Cabinet.
